page.title: 06HOTELS IN CLACTON
page.content: The{Royal Hotel}is one out of many hotels in Clacton in 1985. All the hotels have comfortable rooms, good food and accommodation. The Royal Hotel is a 3 star hotel with first rate service.The breakfasts will put you in a good frame of mind for a day exploring of centuries of history, miles of beach and a great time generally. There are a variety of hotels to be found along the seafront Esplanade itself, as well as in the various roads leading back towards the town. Obviously somewhere will always have a vacancy, but with better Summer weather there are always many visitors who wish to enjoy their holiday in Clacton-on-Sea.
